original_text: and her father hears of her vow and of her pledge by which she has bound herself and says nothing to her, then all her vows shall stand, and every pledge by which she has bound herself shall stand.
korean_text: 그의 아버지가 그의 서원이나 그가 결심한 서약을 듣고도 그에게 아무 말이 없으면 그의 모든 서원을 행할 것이요 그가 결심한 서약을 지킬 것이니라

sentences.original_text: and her father hears of her vow
by which she has bound herself

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그녀에게 아무 말도 하지 않으면

sentences.original_text: then all her vows shall stand
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그녀의 모든 서약은 유효하게 될 것이며

sentences.original_text: by which she has bound herself
